svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Estimates of the total number of people who smoke cigarettes at least daily (across men and women of all ages).
Source: Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME) (2012)
